companyInfo.Competitors: Booz Allen Hamilton, CACI International, CSRA

jobDescription: Job Responsibilities: Joining our Intelligence  Data Analysts will afford you the abilityapply and enhance your  skills with developing, running, and analyzing results of complex queries  against massive scale data stores/data processing environment(s). You  will also increase your skills with the following responsibilities: Manipulating  high-volume structured and unstructured data to perform analysis and  generate reporting/products.Using  analytic techniques and tools performing technical targeting analytic  support to the Sponsor Agency.Developing  and using computer languages (e.g. Python, R, Pig, Java, C, SQL, ECL) to  perform large scale parallel processing of data, and to develop, validate,  and use methodologies to support analytic requirements in Clustered  Computing environments.Performing  All-Source data analysis to perform technical targeting analytic support  in the Intelligence Community.ICAF*Required Education and Experience:
